item.title: Hugo - amnet
item.description:
Aliquam erat volutpat. Nunc eleifend leo vitae magna. In id erat non orci commodo lobortis. Proin neque massa, cursus ut, gravida ut, lobortis eget, lacus.

Sed diam. Praesent fermentum tempor tellus. Nullam tempus. Mauris ac felis vel velit tristique imperdiet. Donec at pede.

item.title: Emacs Jokes
item.description:
Richard M. Stallman (RMS, widely known for creating EMACS) is writing a UNIX clone called GNU (which means Gnu’s Not Unix–a recursive acronym).

This seems to open the way to a whole gnu class of jokes. For example:
